objects.specification: A flat floor surface of sturdy material featuring a neutral matte finish, ensuring a clean and consistent base for the entire booth layout.
A solid booth wall panel of medium thickness with a neutral matte paint finish. It stands vertical at a uniform height and provides a neutral backdrop to highlight the displayed vehicle.
A solid booth wall panel of medium thickness with a neutral matte paint finish. It stands vertical at a uniform height and provides a neutral backdrop to highlight the displayed vehicle.

A sleek modern sedan with aerodynamic contours, a high-gloss paint finish, chrome accent trim, realistic rubber tires with detailed alloy wheels, slightly tinted windows, and clean surface reflections to mimic a showroom model.
A contemporary L-shaped reception desk in a contrasting bold finish, featuring a smooth counter surface, integrated storage compartments below, and a front-facing welcome sign area to greet visitors.
A slim vertical display stand with a sturdy base and an angled top surface designed to hold brochures or small model cars, finished with a contrasting accent color for high visibility.
A slim vertical display stand with a sturdy base and an angled top surface designed to hold brochures or small model cars, finished with a contrasting accent color for high visibility.
A large wall-mounted banner featuring high-resolution branding graphics and product imagery, printed on matte material with subtle frame edging to provide visual interest without glare.

A small round meeting table with a smooth tabletop surface and central pedestal base, finished in an accent color that complements the booth’s palette.

A modern visitor chair with cushioned seat and backrest, four slender legs, and fabric upholstery in a complementary accent color.
